washington_city_paper.title: Corporate Landlords Nickel and Dime D.C. Tenants with Deceptive and Hidden Utility Fees
key_findings: Jamison at Dakota Crossing: $1,500 water bills for 9 months
Tenant LaShawn Melton: Lease specified actual usage but bills didn't match
Kettler would not provide rent history until water bill paid
